data.title: Not open on sundays
data.text: Flew into town on a business trip. Wanted to find a cigar bar to enjoy a cigar and watch football. Being these guys are closed on Sunday's, look for somewhere else!!

data.title: Great service - opened (when closed) for us to buy cigars
data.text:
Although we only bought a couple of cigars to enjoy while walking around beautiful Charlotte - we had a very good experience.  We were looking for a good cigar shop or lounge, but it was a Sunday, and they were closed.  It is located on the first floor of the Charlotte Marriott, along with other restaurants, and stores...  When entering the restaurant to inquire about the Cigar Bar/Lounge - they called a manager right away to OPEN the lounge for us!!  Of course it was only to buy the cigars, ( no drinks, etc.) but we were really impressed that they have this service available, even when the lounge is closed!

The cigars were smooth and smoked well - hubby really enjoyed them.  

Would love to visit when open and hang out, with a good cigar, and a good cordial.

data.title: Decent Selection of Cigars
data.text:
This place had  a decent selection of cigars but little else when compared to other cigar shops.
Did the buy 5 get one free deal and so far 2 out of 3 cigars were not properly humidified and were difficult to smoke.
